attributes.action: abolish the debate on road tolling as the system we have now is fine if this government will widen roads reset traffic lights and stop causing congestion as a way to make the motorist pay even more money in it does not work look at the n.h.s.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why does this government feel the need to heap miserey on the already under pressure poorer motorist our fuel taxes are already one the highest in europe the money from saftey cameras swells thier coffers further i ask you all come on lets get a voice join together and let this government know how we feel or shall we all stand by and watch another bill be passed the result lies with every moterist of this country so come on fight for the right to drive before its to late please

rejection.details: There are several petitions on this issue already. Please consider signing one of those, rather than creating another.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
